snippet: Also, YouTube has a new app for the iPhone, but you have to download it; and as the curtain comes up on Katie Couric's new daytime talk show, the battle for inheriting Oprah Winfrey's mantle begins in earnest.
abstract: Also, YouTube has a new app for the iPhone, but you have to download it; and as the curtain comes up on Katie Couric's new daytime talk show, the battle for inheriting Oprah Winfrey's mantle begins in earnest.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Foxconn's Use of 'Interns,' and Good Nipples, Bad Nipples
